replies.body: The other times probably contributed, there's a decent amount of leniency you need to burn through.

> [{quoted}](name=Jo0o,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Qcs8w5eM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-29T00:57:44.026+0000)
>
> The other times probably contributed, there's a decent amount of leniency you need to burn through.

tbh they deserved the flame...idiots kept flaming us when they were like 11 to our 1 in the early game, then started becoming our bitches when they slowly witnessed their demise, watching master yi pick up kill after kill with his infinite untargetability

i was also mad that my team didnt give two shits on what i thought and sent me alone against a jhin and jinx (didnt matter; i blasted their asses)
That's a dangerous outlook to have, and will get you further punishments if you don't alter it. Flaming is against the rules, full stop.
That attitude is gonna net you a perma.
